mapper.select: select ua.id as applyId,ua.info,ua.time,u1.nickname as contactName,u1.avatar as contactAvatar,ua.labelId, ua.contactId,ua.status,u2.nickname as userName,u2.avatar as userAvatar,u2.id as userId from User u1 join UserApply ua on ua.contactId = u1.id join User u2 on ua.userId = u2.id where ua.userId = #{userId} or ua.contactId = #{userId} order by ua.time desc

select g.id as groupId,g.avatar as groupAvatar,g.name as groupName,ua.status,ua.info,ua.time,ua.id as applyId, g.currentCount as groupMemberCount,g.size as groupSize,gc.status as contactStatus,u.id as applicantId, u.nickName as applicantName,u.avatar as applicantAvatar from UserGroup g join UserApply ua on g.id = ua.contactId join User u on ua.userId = u.id left join GroupContact gc on g.id = gc.groupId where ua.userId = #{userId} or g.ownerId = #{userId} order by ua.time desc
